name: War of Geobrog
description:
The game is not finished yet.

It seems that the motivation of joining the jam is to use the Unity plugins bought long time ago and had no time to play around. For the purpose of using, learning these plugins,  it turns out to be rewarded. But for the game jam purpose, the work is not finished.

The game is designed to be the battle of two sides, Hexahdron(mainly cube and cuboid) and Octahedron. Hexahdron side prepares to invade Octahedron tribe. The player, a traveler of Octahedron side, is warned that the battle starts soon. So the player tries to go back to tribe.

At the way back to home, player will encounter troops of Hexahdron, which can transform themselves to tank, rocket launcher, etc. Therefore, the player has to try going back without alerting their attentions.

While making the game, don't have enough time to assemble  the main gameplay. Therefore, it turns out to be tech centric prototype rather than a game.
